publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2460 Nigel Don: Scottish Schools Word Debating Team—That the Parliament notes the commencement of the World Schools Debating Championships in Washington, D.C., United States of America, between 5 and 15 September 2008; sends its very best wishes to the Scottish team of Joanna Farmer, Lauren Pringle, Natalie Smith, Rachel Watson and Sandy Jackson; notes that Scotland is the defending champion, and is sure that team members will do their schools, coaches, the nation and, most importantly, themselves proud.

S3M-2460 Scottish Schools World Debating Team (lodged on 1 September 2008) Jack McConnell*, Mike Pringle*, John Lamont*, Liam McArthur*, Jim Tolson*, Sandra White*, Marlyn Glen*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Hugh Henry*, Rob Gibson*, Michael Matheson*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Wilson*, John Park*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Gil Paterson*, Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Keith Brown*, David McLetchie*, Robin Harper*, Robert Brown*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bashir Ahmad*, Elizabeth Smith*
S3M-2460 Scottish Schools World Debating Team (lodged on 1 September 2008) Ian McKee*, Patrick Harvie*

S3M-2460 Nigel Don: Scottish Schools World Debating Team—That the Parliament notes the commencement of the World Schools Debating Championships in Washington, D.C., United States of America, between 5 and 15 September 2008; sends its very best wishes to the Scottish team of Joanna Farmer, Lauren Pringle, Natalie Smith, Rachel Watson and Sandy Jackson; notes that Scotland is the defending champion, and is sure that team members will do their schools, coaches, the nation and, most importantly, themselves proud. Supported by: Jack McConnell, Mike Pringle, John Lamont, Liam McArthur, Jim Tolson, Sandra White, Marlyn Glen, Alasdair Allan, Stuart McMillan, Hugh Henry, Rob Gibson, Michael Matheson, Aileen Campbell, Bill Wilson, John Park, Hugh O’Donnell, Gil Paterson, Brian Adam, Bill Kidd, Bob Doris, Keith Brown, David McLetchie, Robin Harper, Robert Brown, Jamie Hepburn, Bashir Ahmad, Elizabeth Smith, Ian McKee, Patrick Harvie, Ken Macintosh*, Jamie McGrigor*
S3M-2460 Scottish Schools World Debating Team (lodged on 1 September 2008) Jamie Stone*
S3M-2460 Scottish Schools World Debating Team (lodged on 1 September 2008) Angela Constance*
